content: We have published the schedule for FHIR DevDays 2017, 15-17 November in Amsterdam. You can find it here: https://www.fhirdevdays.com/schedule/.
Hi Rien, we've discussed moving my Wednesday talk earlier in the day - I want to be able to give the stream attendees homework for the remainder of the day (if they want to it of course :) )

Hi Rien, we've discussed moving my Wednesday talk earlier in the day - I want to be able to give the stream attendees homework for the remainder of the day (if they want to it of course :) )

If you and Richard agree, then it's ok for us too.
Rien, yes David and I have worked it out and Marita has confirmed that David's session is now scheduled for Wed at 9:45am. Thanks
Note that Announcements, not discussions about them. The latter should be on social or implementers...
